message: Let's split the money. A 60/40 split seems fair for both of us.
I think a 60/40 split is fair, with me getting the larger share since I'm the one making the offer this round. Let's end this quickly!
Bob, let's be reasonable. We both lose if this drags on. I'm offering you 45% - it's better than nothing in the next round when the value drops further!
